meanings.definition: To pick up or manipulate with tongs.
meanings.sent1: She was tonging the hot noodles carefully.
meanings.sent2: He always enjoys tonging the barbecue on weekends.
meanings.sent3: The chef was tonging the salad ingredients with precision.
meanings.sent4: The blacksmith was tonging the glowing metal in the forge.
meanings.sent5: The child was tonging the colorful candies from the jar.

meanings.definition: To fish for oysters using tongs.
meanings.sent1: They were tonging for oysters near the shore.
meanings.sent2: The fishermen tong oysters from the seabed.
meanings.sent3: The oysters were surprised to see tongs instead of hands.
meanings.sent4: She tonged the oysters like a pro, swiftly and skillfully.
meanings.sent5: Tonging for oysters requires patience and a steady hand.

meanings.sent1: The tonging of the salad was done with care.
